gs.col_start: Follows A1 format. For example if your spreadsheet range is A1:J100, your col_start will be `A`
gs.col_end: Follows A1 format. For example if your spreadsheet range is A1:J100, your col_end will be `J`
headers: Add your person(s) involved here. You may add more than one person as additional entries with their first name.
